events.message: We have received the application from Jane Doe for the Software Engineer role in our backend team.
Jane Doe's application has been categorized under Engineering based on keywords such as software engineer and development experience.
Recruiter Mike Thompson has been assigned to manage Jane Doe's hiring process within the Engineering department.
An initial screening was conducted for Jane Doe; her software development skills and project experience appear promising.
Jane responded promptly to the screening feedback, expressing enthusiasm about the opportunity and availability for interviews.
The technical interview with the senior engineering team has been scheduled for Jane on May 8th at 2 PM UTC.
Jane completed the technical interview, successfully demonstrating her skills in backend system design and coding.
Following a successful technical round, Jane's HR interview has been scheduled for May 12th at 11 AM UTC.
Jane completed the HR interview, showing strong cultural fit and alignment with company values.
An official offer has been proposed to Jane for the Software Engineer position with competitive salary and benefits.
Jane provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed excitement about joining the engineering team.
Jane has officially accepted the job offer and is looking forward to starting her new role.
Jane started the onboarding process, completing all required documentation and orientation sessions.
The hiring process is now closed successfully and Jane is fully onboarded as a new Software Engineer.
